<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4547</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Writing</string>
            <string language="es">Escritura</string>
            <string language="ga">Scríbhneoireacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escrita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scrittura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γράψιμο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">That the pupils will be very prepared to read agus it will help them in their writing.</string>
            <string language="es">Los alumnos estarán muy preparados para leer y les ayudará en su escritura.</string>
            <string language="ga">Go mbeadh na daltaí an-ullamh le dul ag léamh agus cabhróidh sé seo go mór leo agus iad ag scríobh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Léitheoireacht</string>
            <string language="es">Lectura. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Léitheoireacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
            <string language="ga">Advice Sheet</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Daß die Schüler sehr vorbereitet werden, agus zu
lesen es, hilft ihnen in ihrem Schreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Que les élèves seront très disposés à lire 
l'agus il les aidera dans leur écriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que os alunos estarão preparados muito para ler o
agus ele ajudar-lhes-á em sua escrita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che gli allievi molto saranno preparati per 
leggere il agus esso li aiuterà nella loro scrittura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ότι οι μαθητές θα είναι πολύ έτοιμοι να διαβάσουν το
agus θα τους βοηθήσει στο γράψιμό τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Léitheoireacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Irlandais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Léitheoireacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Irlandese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Léitheoireacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιρλανδικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
